name: Ascension VR
description: Now updated with the War of Shadows expansion and support for motion controls! Come try out the expansion with the devs, Tuesday nights at 8pm Pacific. Ascension VR is the first deckbuilding Virtual Reality experience.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or higher Processor: Intel Core i3 2.00 GHz or AMD equivalent Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 450 or higher DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 600 MB available space Additional Notes: Requires Vive, DK2 or Rift
